Patients non-resectable stage III stage IV melanoma stratify base BRAF mutation tumor load start dabrafenib+trametinib ( BRAF mutation high tumor load ) pembrolizumab ( BRAF wild type BRAF mutation low tumor load ) first line . The patient randomize 2:1 receive BGB324 combination pembrolizumab dabrafenib+trametinib receive pembrolizumab dabrafenib+trametinib alone . A 3+3 dose escalation perform combination BGB324 dabrafenib+trametinib . There major focus predictive marker treatment response evaluate blood sample biopsy .
